attributes.action: Child maintenance discrimination paying parents pay a 20% fee  receiving only 4%
attributes.background:
child maintenance. You have to pay a fee each time you make or receive a payment: paying parents will pay a 20% fee on top of their regular child maintenance payment and the receiving only 4% which is a charge of 24% to collect the money. 
This is discrimination parents should be treated equally

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you'd like to happen to child maintenance payments. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
